release-notes: - Added config option to allow toggleing engine only when vehicle owner (or key when using VehicleKeyChain).
- Fixed vehicle being repaired when an extra was toggled. (again)
- Fixed vehicle being repaired when an extra was toggled.
- Fixed vehicle "flipping" when interacting while entering.
- Fixed an error related to the menu not opening when not using VehicleKeyChain.
- Fixed a server and client side error when using the lock button without a vehicle close.
- Better performance when opening the menu.
- Fixed Compatibility with newest [VehicleKeyChain](https://forum.cfx.re/t/release-vehicle-key-chain/3319563) update.
- Added compatibility with [VehicleKeyChain](https://forum.cfx.re/t/release-vehicle-key-chain/3319563).
- Added kimi_callbacks to the dependencies.
- Fixed group not being set properly and the Delete Option missing from the menu.
- Added [kimi_callbacks](https://forum.cfx.re/t/release-callbacks-using-exports-and-with-added-timeouts-free/3035585) script for callbacks. This is a necessity and needs to be installed properly!
- Added config option for disabling vehicle air controls.
- Added config option for disabling vehicle roll over.
- Added the ability to flip a vehicle from outside (configurable force multiplier) (more players = more force).
- Neonlights option is now only for vehicle owner or driver.
- Opening/Closing of vehicle doors is now only for vehicle owner.
- Other players can only open the door of their respective seat or if they are close enough.
- Fixed vehicle engine not staying off when entering a vehicle after a server restart.
- Fixed Lockstatus Unlocked from 0 to 1. This fixes compatibility with many other scripts (like trunk inventories).
- Fixed lock button not using vehicle ownership.
- Updated to ContextMenu v1.1 (update that as well or you will get errors!)
- Added config options for keeping the engine on/off when exiting/entering a vehicle.
- Added config option for turning the engine on/off when inside the vehicle with a button.
- Added config option for locking vehicle with a button.
- Added config option for max distance for the menu.
- Fixed Radio option being enabled for any vehicle.
- Fixed Headlight option being enabled for any vehicle.
- Fixed an error regarding the delete option.
- Fixed several errors regarding ESX.
- Made it compatible with those stupid non-8-symbol plates some ESX scripts use.
- Fixed a server side error with the sql queries.
- Fixed a client side error related using the shuffle function from the menu.
